document.full_text: as votes were being counted thursday in south africa's local elections, the governing african national congress was once again steamrolling to victory, though not quite at its customary pace.
document.title: a.n.c. leading in south african vote, as second-place party makes some gains
lines_and_colors: as votes were being counted thursday in south africa's local elections, the governing african national congress was once again steamrolling to victory, though not quite at its customary pace.
